text: @GregAbbott_TX Trump’s Fox Town Hall shows him doubling down on his claim that the lockdown saved 1.2 Million lives, a lie. Projected death numbers do not add up. The death rate data shows it would be impossible, coronavirus is NOT as deadly as the flu & there was cure Hydroxychlorquine.
